name: Big Story Little Heroes! (Canceled)
blurb: A highly coop Action MOBA on browser, for hours of fun with your friends. Join this indieheart-made JRPG-inspired universe.

rewards.reward: [SUPPORTER] \r\nBe part of the campaign and receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's BRONZE BADGE for your Avatar + 500 in-game Crowns so you can play the game in style!

[FOUNDER]\r\nOnly available during Kickstarter, receive the Hourglass UNIQUE ITEM (resets all cooldown on chance to hit) + Exclusive PIGASUS WINGS to identify you as a Kickstarter Founder of BSLH + An additional 500 Crowns + Includes all previous rewards.

[EARLY BIRD: UNLOCK ANY CLASS]\r\nFully unlock ANY CLASS of your choice (including the new TRICKSTER!)  and its Limited Edition Skin + Be treated like a HERO and receive a Virtual Game Card with 300 Crowns EVERY MONTH for the rest of your BSLH life + Also gain early BETA ACCESS to all the new features announced + Includes all previous rewards

[UNLOCK THE NEW TRICKSTER + VIP BONUS]\r\nUnlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + Be treated like a VIP and receive a Virtual Game Card with 300 Crowns EVERY MONTH for the rest of your BSLH life + Also gain early BETA ACCESS to all the new features announced + Includes all previous rewards.

[DUO TRICKSTER + WARRIOR]\r\nFully unlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + The entire WARRIOR Advanced Classes with a Limited Edition Warrior SKIN + Receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's SILVER BADGE for your Avatar  + Includes all previous rewards.

[DUO TRICKSTER + MAGE]\r\nFully unlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + The entire MAGE Advanced Classes with a Limited Edition Mage SKIN + Receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's SILVER BADGE for your Avatar  + Includes all previous rewards.

[DUO TRICKSTER + ENGINEER]\r\nFully unlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + The entire ENGINEER Advanced Classes with a Limited Edition Engineer SKIN + Receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's SILVER BADGE for your Avatar  + Includes all previous rewards.

[DUO TRICKSTER + PRIEST]\r\nFully unlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + The entire PRIEST Advanced Classes with a Limited Edition Pries SKIN + Receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's SILVER BADGE for your Avatar  + Includes all previous rewards.

[DUO TRICKSTER + ARCHER]\r\nFully unlock the new TRICKSTER CLASS + The entire ARCHER Advanced Classes with a Limited Edition Archer SKIN + Receive an exclusive Kickstarter Founder's SILVER BADGE for your Avatar  + Includes all previous rewards.

[DIGITAL GAME BOOKLET, ARTBOOK & OST] Receive the downloadable Game BOOKLET + The ARTBOOK that includes concept arts, behind the scenes ideas, and the Little Heroes' character sheets in sweet PDF format + A Copy of the Original Soundtrack composed by Vandal Games' very own composer + Includes a Full Warrior or Full Mage or Full Engineer or Full Priest, or Full Archer.

[COLLECTOR'S EDITION] Unlock ALL CLASSES along with their Limited Edition SKINS + a Special Kickstarter  NEROSETH's Skin + Receive a Virtual Game Card with 600 Crowns every month for the rest of your BSLH life + An exclusive Kickstarter Founder's GOLD BADGE for your Avatar + Digital BOOKLET, ARTBOOK &OST.
[FANATIC] We'll ship you a Limited Physical Edition of Game BOOKLET & OST CD signed by the team + The Special BSLH T-shirt. Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[DESIGN A HEADGEAR] Participate in a new Headgear DESIGN with the Vandal Games team and be able to gift it 10x to your friends! Also receive a BSLH GAME DESIGNER TSHIRT to show off! Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[DESIGN A SKIN BUNDLE] Participate in a new Skin Bundle DESIGN with the Vandal Games team and be able to gift it 10x to your friends! Also receive a BSLH GAME DESIGNER TSHIRT to show off! Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[DESIGN A SKILL] Participate in a new Skill DESIGN with the Vandal Games team and be able to gift it 10x to your friends! Also receive a BSLH GAME DESIGNER TSHIRT to show off! Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[PRIVATE SKIN DESIGNER] Participate in a an Pivate Skin Bundle DESIGN with the Vandal Games team that only you will be able to gift to your friends. It will never be sold! Also receive a BSLH Game Designer Tshirt to show off! Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[DESIGN A MAP] Participate in a new Map DESIGN with the Vandal Games team and be able to BETA TEST it with your friends! Also receive a BSLH GAME DESIGNER TSHIRT to show off! Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.

[FLY OUT TO E3 2014] We'll fly you out and house you in Los Angeles to attend the gaming mecha E3 alongside with the team members of Vandal Games. (North America only). Includes COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards.
